thread.section_title: Hotel le Tourville - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very, very nice
thread.title_full: Very, very nice - Review of Hotel le Tourville, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Suanna G
title: Very, very nice
text:
What a nice experience! The staff was friendly and helpful, especially Natalia and Jackson! Many thoughtful amenities: thick towels, - so close to the Eiffel Tower. The area has many restaurants. But the staff really made it special.
Room Tip: Our room had a window that opened and I would recommend this. See more room tips
